name: black-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A glass flute that keeps away wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A glass flute that keeps away wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A black glass flute. When blown, it makes wild POKéMON less likely to appear.
